name: Add new SharpSpring form fills to Google Sheets as new rows
description: Every time you receive a new form in SharpSpring, Make will automatically add selected data from the form to a new row in a Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses [this example spreadsheet.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Gsslg9TlNb1xv2x-SeC5U2kwliVBKO1poFidRBNRT88/edit?usp=sharing)
